meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive EJ Filander Glenn Stoops Ann Wheeler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #973.

td.p: EJ Filander, a student teacher from Malvern, Pennsylvania
Glenn Stoops, a mathematician from Dayton, Ohio
Ann Wheeler, a systems engineer from Oakland, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,801)

tr.td: FAMOUS FOLKS
THE CIVIL WAR
TV DETECTIVES
HOLLYWOOD QUOTES
SWEETS
FROM THE LATIN
